12 weeks into the season, I have computed pythagorean expectations based on @fboutsiders adjusted pythagorean theorem and compared them to the actual wins of each team. The table is sorted by expected wins based on points scored and points allowed.
Data: #nflverse https://t.co/ePlTmPDrgP

Summary of NFL Week 12 price changes:

Many bettors are eager to call a top on the Patriots after the spread v the Titans widened 4 points the last week. Maybe sentiment is a bit overheated, but that 4 point move isn't all Patriots-related üëÄ #nflverse

AFC North QB Efficiency through Week 11 shows Ben Roethlisberger continuing to make strides towards the rest of the starting QB pack. #nflverse https://t.co/551sCjvPiC

APP UPDATE: You can now compare individual quarterback seasons from 2006-2021 in a variety of relevant categories including EPA/play, CPOE, and DVOA‚Äì‚Äìplus contextual factors such as air yards and PFF receiving/pass blocking grades.

#nflverse
https://t.co/p2eU4hD1mR https://t.co/g3w0BOD9jq
The #nflverse games data and https://t.co/sWcfd2gLrn have been updated to reflect these changes. https://t.co/w3mq0lQixi
https://t.co/1FeWUqqhUq and the #nflverse game data have been updated to reflect these changes. https://t.co/NOXJhlIWrB

Welp, I am extremely mad at myself.  After running this week's simulations and seeing that - checks notes - the @steelers were estimated to be the 3rd best team in the nation, I knew something was amiss.  #nflverse https://t.co/2zq0HRlbTr

So I went digging through my code, and low and behold, a single instance in which I called "predict" on a gamlss object, but used "new_data" instead of "newdata", meaning that the simulation was looping through training data predictions #nflverse

This, of course, was not ideal, and while its issue was mitigated by the other parts of the algorithm, it obviously was causing incorrect outcomes, and therefore, poor estimates of strength and game-by-game predictions.  I am deeply sorry if I have misled you :( #nflverse
for today steelers game, i make a plot of points of each qtr for 1999-2020 reg season. from #nflverse https://t.co/7SOiym4Gro

After forcing seven turnovers with zero giveaways in their last three games (+32 total EPA on those seven plays), the Colts are now the team that has benefitted the most from turnover plays in 2021.

Data: #nflverse https://t.co/bxzHZ8Y89O

Es y no es recepci√≥n a la vez. Todo depende del observador
#NFLverse

Based on this look at total DPI yards gained vs. total number of DPIs earned, I'm pretty sure Russell Wilson does the whole "screw it, Lockett is out there somewhere" when he is under pressure. 

@gbellseattle @bcondotta #nflverse https://t.co/GVKcv3sZop
